metadata.title: A Formal Theory of Commonsense Psychology: How People Think People Think
metadata.authors: Andrew S. Gordon and Jerry R. Hobbs
metadata.description: Chapter 48 axioms covering observation of plan executions, instructions, performances, skill assessment, and evaluation of agent behaviors
metadata.notation: First-order logic with reified eventualities and defeasible reasoning

axioms.title: Definition of observableExecution
axioms.fol: (forall (e b c) (iff (observableExecution e b c) (exists (a p e0 e1 e2) (and (executePlan' e a p)(execute' e1 a e0 p) (not (agentOf b e)) (possible e2 c)(perceive' e2 b e1)))))
axioms.english: Execution e is observable by agent b under constraints c if some subgoal execution e1 can be perceived by b

axioms.title: Definition of unobservableExecution
axioms.fol: (forall (e b c) (iff (unobservableExecution e b c) (exists (a p) (and (executePlan' e a p)(not (agentOf b e)) (forall (e0 e1 e2) (if (and (execute' e1 a e0 p) (perceive' e2 b e1)) (not (possible e2 c))))))))
axioms.english: Execution e is unobservable by agent b under constraints c if no subgoal execution can be perceived by b

axioms.title: Definition of observedExecution
axioms.fol: (forall (e b) (iff (observedExecution e b) (exists (a p e0 e1 e2) (and (executePlan' e a p)(execute' e1 a e0 p) (not (agentOf b e)) (perceive b e1)))))
axioms.english: Execution e is actually observed by agent b if b perceives some subgoal execution of e

axioms.title: Definition of unobservedExecution
axioms.fol: (forall (e b) (iff (unobservedExecution e b) (exists (a p) (and (executePlan' e a p)(not (agentOf b e)) (forall (e0 e1) (if (execute' e1 a e0 p) (not (perceive b e1))))))))
axioms.english: Execution e is unobserved by agent b if b perceives no subgoal executions of e

axioms.title: Definition of observedByNoneExecution
axioms.fol: (forall (e) (iff (observedByNoneExecution e) (forall (b) (if (not (agentOf b e))(unobservedExecution e b)))))
axioms.english: Execution e is observed by no one except its agent if all other agents fail to observe it

axioms.title: Observed executions are observable
axioms.fol: (forall (e b) (if (observedExecution e b) (exists (c) (and (observableExecution e b c)(Rexist c)))))
axioms.english: If execution e is actually observed by agent b, then there exist constraints c under which e is observable by b

axioms.title: Unobservable executions are unobserved
axioms.fol: (forall (e b c) (if (and (unobservableExecution e b c)(Rexist c)) (unobservedExecution e b)))
axioms.english: If execution e is unobservable by agent b under existing constraints c, then e is unobserved by b

axioms.title: Definition of document
axioms.fol: (forall (d) (iff (document d) (exists (y s) (mean d y s))))
axioms.english: Document d is any meaning-bearing object that means concept y to members of social group s

axioms.title: Definition of instructions
axioms.fol: (forall (d g) (iff (instructions d g) (exists (p s a) (and (document d)(mean d p s) (member a s)(plan p a g)))))
axioms.english: Document d is instructions for goal g if d means plan p to group s members, where p is a plan to achieve g

axioms.title: Definition of explicitPlan
axioms.fol: (forall (p a g) (iff (explicitPlan p a g) (exists (d s) (and (instructions d g)(mean d p s) (member a s)(plan p a g)))))
axioms.english: Plan p is explicit for agent a and goal g if there exists a document specifying p as instructions for g

axioms.title: Definition of performance
axioms.fol: (forall (e a p s) (iff (performance e a p s) (exists (g) (and (explicitPlan p a g)(executePlan' e a p) (forall (b) (if (member b s)(perceive b e)))))))
axioms.english: Event e is a performance by agent a of plan p before audience s if e executes explicit plan p and all audience members perceive e

axioms.title: Definition of performanceSpecification
axioms.fol: (forall (d a g) (iff (performanceSpecification d a g) (exists (e p s) (and (instructions d g)(performance e a p s) (explicitPlan p a g)))))
axioms.english: Document d is a performance specification for agent a and goal g if d specifies instructions for a performance of plan p

axioms.title: Definition of candidatePerformanceSpecification
axioms.fol: (forall (e d a g) (iff (candidatePerformanceSpecification' e d a g) (exists (e1 e2 c e3) (and (believe' e3 a e1)(gen e3 e)(possible' e1 e2 c) (performanceSpecification' e2 d a g)))))
axioms.english: Event e is d being a candidate performance specification for agent a to achieve goal g when a believes d is possibly a performance specification

axioms.title: Definition of generateCandidatePerformanceSpecification
axioms.fol: (forall (e a d g) (iff (generateCandidatePerformanceSpecification' e d a g) (exists (e1 e2) (and (changeTo' e2 e1)(gen e2 e) (candidatePerformanceSpecification' e1 d a g)))))
axioms.english: Event e is generating candidate performance specification d for agent a to achieve goal g through a change to that state

axioms.title: Definition of modifyCandidatePerformanceSpecification
axioms.fol: (forall (e a d1 d2 g) (iff (modifyCandidatePerformanceSpecification' e d1 d2 a g) (exists (e1 e2 e3) (and (change' e3 e1 e2)(gen e3 e) (candidatePerformanceSpecification' e1 d1 a g) (candidatePerformanceSpecification' e2 d2 a g)))))
axioms.english: Event e is modifying candidate performance specification from document d1 to d2 for agent a to achieve goal g

axioms.title: Definition of invalidateCandidatePerformanceSpecification
axioms.fol: (forall (e a d g) (iff (invalidateCandidatePerformanceSpecification' e d a g) (exists (e1 e2 e3 e4) (and (change' e4 e1 e2)(gen e4 e) (candidatePerformanceSpecification' e1 d a g) (believe' e2 a e3)(not' e3 e1)))))
axioms.english: Event e is invalidating candidate performance specification d for agent a when a stops believing d is a performance specification

axioms.title: Definition of validateCandidatePerformanceSpecification
axioms.fol: (forall (e a d g) (iff (validateCandidatePerformanceSpecification' e d a g) (exists (e1 e2 e3) (and (change' e3 e1 e2)(gen e3 e) (candidatePerformanceSpecification' e1 d a g) (performanceSpecification' e2 d a g)))))
axioms.english: Event e is validating candidate performance specification d for agent a when d is promoted to a performance specification

axioms.title: Definition of rightWay
axioms.fol: (forall (e a p d) (iff (rightWay e a p d) (exists (s) (and (executePlan' e a p)(mean d p s)))))
axioms.english: Event e is the right way for agent a to carry out plan p according to document d if e executes p and d describes p

axioms.title: Definition of attemptExecute
axioms.fol: (forall (e1 a p p1 g) (iff (attemptExecute' e1 a p p1 g) (exists (e e2 e3) (and (executePlan' e3 a p1)(gen e3 e1)(plan p a g)(plan p1 a g) (goal' e2 e a)(executePlan' e a p) (cause e2 e1)))))
axioms.english: Event e1 is an attempted execution by agent a of plan p, actually instantiating plan p1, where wanting to execute p causes executing p1

axioms.title: More skilled execution condition 1
axioms.fol: (forall (e1 e2 a p p1 p2 s s1 s2 s3 s4 s5 s6) (if (and (attemptExecute' e1 a p p1 g) (attemptExecute' e2 a p p2 g) (subgoalsOf s p)(subgoalsOf s1 p1)(subgoalsOf s2 p2) (setdiff s3 s1 s)(setdiff s4 s2 s) (intersection s5 s1 s)(intersection s6 s2 s) (subset s3 s4)(properSubset s6 s5)) (moreSkilled e1 e2 p)))
axioms.english: Execution e1 is more skilled than e2 at plan p if e1 has fewer extraneous subgoals and more correct subgoals than e2

axioms.title: More skilled execution condition 2
axioms.fol: (forall (e1 e2 a p p1 p2 s s1 s2 s3 s4 s5 s6) (if (and (attemptExecute' e1 a p p1 g) (attemptExecute' e2 a p p2 g) (subgoalsOf s p)(subgoalsOf s1 p1)(subgoalsOf s2 p2) (setdiff s3 s1 s)(setdiff s4 s2 s) (intersection s5 s1 s)(intersection s6 s2 s) (properSubset s3 s4)(subset s6 s5)) (moreSkilled e1 e2 p)))
axioms.english: Execution e1 is more skilled than e2 at plan p if e2 has more extraneous subgoals than e1 and not fewer correct subgoals

axioms.title: Definition of skillScale
axioms.fol: (forall (s p) (iff (skillScale s p) (exists (s1 a g e1 e2) (and (scaleDefinedBy s s1 e)(plan p a g) (forall (e0) (if (member e0 s1) (exists (a1 p1) (and (plan p1 a1 g) (attemptExecute' e0 a1 p p1 g))))) (moreSkilled' e e1 e2 p)))))
axioms.english: Scale s is the skill scale for plan p, defined by attempted executions ordered by the moreSkilled relation

axioms.title: Definition of skilled
axioms.fol: (forall (e p) (iff (skilled e p) (exists (s s1) (and (skillScale s p)(Hi s1 s) (inScale e s1)))))
axioms.english: Attempted execution e was skilled at plan p if e is in the high region of the skill scale for p

axioms.title: Skill level constraint
axioms.fol: (forall (y e1 e2 p) (if (and (skillLevel y e1 p)(skillLevel y e2 p)) (and (not (moreSkilled e1 e2 p)) (not (moreSkilled e2 e1 p)))))
axioms.english: If executions e1 and e2 have the same skill level y for plan p, then neither is more skilled than the other

axioms.title: Skill levels are at relations
axioms.fol: (forall (s y e p) (if (and (skillScale s p)(skillLevel y e p)) (at e y s)))
axioms.english: If y is a skill level for execution e of plan p and s is the skill scale for p, then e is at position y on scale s

axioms.title: Agent-independent skill levels
axioms.fol: (forall (e1 e2 a1 a2 p p1 p2 g s) (if (and (attemptExecute' e1 a1 p p1 g) (attemptExecute' e2 a2 p p2 g) (skillScale s p) (subst a1 e1 a2 e2)) (forall (y) (iff (skillLevel y e1 p)(skillLevel y e2 p)))))
axioms.english: Skill levels are agent-independent: executions that differ only in the performing agent have the same skill level

axioms.title: Definition of evaluate
axioms.fol: (forall (e b e1 p y) (iff (evaluate' e b e1 p y) (exists (a p1 g e2 e3 s e4 e5) (and (attemptExecute' e1 a p p1 g) (changeTo' e5 e2)(gen e5 e)(believe' e2 b e3) (skillLevel' e3 y e1 p) (perceive' e4 b e1)(cause e4 e5)))))
axioms.english: Event e is agent b evaluating performance e1 of plan p as skill level y, caused by perceiving e1 and resulting in believing the skill level

axioms.title: Definition of evaluationResult
axioms.fol: (forall (y e) (iff (evaluationResult y e) (exists (b e1 p) (evaluate' e b e1 p y))))
axioms.english: Value y is the result of evaluation e if there is some agent evaluating some performance with result y

axioms.title: Witnessing causes evaluation
axioms.fol: (forall (a b e1 e4 p p1 g) (if (and (perceive' e4 b e1) (attemptExecute' e1 a p p1 g)(etc)) (exists (e y) (and (evaluate' e b e1 p y) (cause e4 e)))))
axioms.english: If agent b witnesses attempted execution e1 of plan p, then defeasibly b evaluates e1, caused by the witnessing

axioms.title: Definition of evaluationCriterion
axioms.fol: (forall (e0 p) (iff (evaluationCriterion e0 p) (exists (e b e1 y e2) (and (evaluate' e b e1 p y)(evaluationResult' e2 y e) (arg* e1 e0)(causallyInvolved e0 e2)))))
axioms.english: Property e0 is an evaluation criterion for plan p if e0 is a property of some execution and causally involved in evaluation results

conversion_notes.reified_predicates: Extensive use of primed predicates for actions and mental states like executePlan', perceive', evaluate', attemptExecute', indicating reified eventuality structures
conversion_notes.defeasible_reasoning: Uses (etc) predicate in one axiom for defeasible rule about evaluation following from witnessing performances
conversion_notes.skill_assessment: Novel formalization of skill as partial ordering based on subgoal matching, with skill scales and levels for systematic evaluation
conversion_notes.observation_theory: Systematic treatment of observable vs. observed plan executions, distinguishing possibility from actuality of perception
conversion_notes.instruction_framework: Communication theory integration with documents as meaning-bearing objects and instructions as plan specifications
conversion_notes.performance_evaluation: Complete framework for performance specification, candidate generation, validation/invalidation, and skill-based evaluation

file_format_notes.axiom_extraction: All 30 axioms extracted from pages 502-510 with complete FOL expressions and natural language explanations
file_format_notes.predicate_inventory: 25 new predicates introduced specifically for plan observation, instruction, performance, and evaluation concepts
file_format_notes.complexity_analysis: Balanced complexity distribution with moderate axioms predominating due to multi-step process definitions
file_format_notes.pattern_categorization: 16 distinct axiom patterns identified, with basic definitions most common, plus specialized skill and evaluation patterns
file_format_notes.cross_references: Heavy integration with planning, belief, perception, and scale theory frameworks from previous chapters
